stories.Title: A brighter outlook for AI
stories.Description: Looking beyond the doomsday lens, AI holds immense promise. Marc Andreessen encourages us to focus on the positive side and explore the abundant opportunities it presents.
stories.Tweet: A brighter outlook for AI 📦 Looking beyond the doomsday lens, AI holds immense promise. Marc Andreessen encourages us to focus on the positive side and explore the abundant opportunities it presents. #ai https://a16z.com/2023/06/06/ai-will-save-the-world/

stories.Title: Blueprint: Integrations made easy
stories.Description: Merge's latest tool, Blueprint, allows developers and non-technical employees to simplify API integration with the help of OpenAI's GPT-3.5.
stories.Tweet: Blueprint: Integrations made easy 📦 Merge's latest tool, Blueprint, allows developers and non-technical employees to simplify API integration with the help of OpenAI's GPT-3.5. #ai https://venturebeat.com/ai/merge-unveils-blueprint-an-ai-powered-tool-to-enable-easier-api-integrations/

stories.Title: Instagram joins the chatbot frenzy
stories.Description: The platform is reportedly developing an AI chatbot that aims to enhance user expression by offering assistance with questions, advice, and message composition.
stories.Tweet: Instagram joins the chatbot frenzy 📦 The platform is reportedly developing an AI chatbot that aims to enhance user expression by offering assistance with questions, advice, and message composition. #instagram https://www.businessinsider.com/instagram-developing-ai-chatbot-multiple-personalities-report-2023-6

stories.Title: WordPress unveils Jetpack
stories.Description: Blogging is now a breeze with Jetpack, the AI writing assistant for WordPress, that provides you with content ideas, grammar support, and even translation.
stories.Tweet: WordPress unveils Jetpack 📦 Blogging is now a breeze with Jetpack, the AI writing assistant for WordPress, that provides you with content ideas, grammar support, and even translation. #ai https://www.engadget.com/wordpress-jetpack-ai-will-write-your-blog-posts-for-you-121009297.html

stories.Title: Adobe Stock gets filled with AI
stories.Description: Recent reports highlight a rise of AI in stock photography, as they're earning an average revenue per image per month (RPI/m) four and a half times higher than traditional photos.
stories.Tweet: Adobe Stock gets filled with AI 📦 Recent reports highlight a rise of AI in stock photography, as they're earning an average revenue per image per month (RPI/m) four and a half times higher than traditional photos. #ai https://petapixel.com/2023/06/06/ai-images-are-outperforming-photos-on-adobe-stock/

stories.Title: Make your own chatbot with OpenChat
stories.Description: This user-friendly chatbot console simplifies the use of large language models. Avoid overwhelming AI installations and optimize the process for creating your own comprehensive chatbot.
stories.Tweet: Make your own chatbot with OpenChat 📦 This user-friendly chatbot console simplifies the use of large language models. Avoid overwhelming AI installations and optimize the process for creating your own comprehensive chatbot. #ai https://github.com/openchatai/OpenChat

stories.Title: GM is redefining design
stories.Description: With the Proxima EV design concept, the automaker seeks to appeal to Chinese electric vehicle customers by introducing a new level of cutting-edge architecture.
stories.Tweet: GM is redefining design 📦 With the Proxima EV design concept, the automaker seeks to appeal to Chinese electric vehicle customers by introducing a new level of cutting-edge architecture. #generalmotors https://electrek.co/2023/06/06/gm-reveals-proxima-future-ev-design-and-platform/

stories.Title: Powering through the cold
stories.Description: Greater Bay Technology, a battery startup in China, has developed an innovative cell technology that ensures consistent charging performance, regardless of the weather.
stories.Tweet: Powering through the cold 📦 Greater Bay Technology, a battery startup in China, has developed an innovative cell technology that ensures consistent charging performance, regardless of the weather. #startups https://electrek.co/2023/06/07/chinese-unicorn-startup-ev-battery-operates-normal-in-winter/

stories.Title: Meet the tiny giant
stories.Description: Compact and wallet-friendly, Volvo's latest innovation, the EX30, is the perfect EV for eco-conscious drivers.

stories.Description: If you've missed out on the exciting new features coming to iOS 17, fear not! Here's a quick recap to keep you informed.

stories.Title: An eventful summer for Firefly Aerospace
stories.Description: With a shift in their launch schedule, they're now eyeing August to send a batch of CubeSats for NASA.
